MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW3 and CW5 postcode areas of Crewe and Nantwich, affecting properties in Monks Lane and Audlem Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.04AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11.15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.35AM on 10th April 2021.
